ai_operations.reasoning: The initial 6 clusters were too broad, with 5 large clusters (37-68 messages each) covering multiple project phases. No merges were appropriate as all clusters represented distinct projects. I split the 5 largest project-based clusters into smaller, more focused sub-topics (e.g., Planning, Legal, Execution), which is the most effective way to increase the cluster count to the target range of 12-15. The single smaller, coherent cluster (cluster_006) was left intact. This results in a final count of 15 highly specific and useful clusters.
